body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->

**What happened**:

Eviction manager evicts the below static and critical pod when the node observed MemoryPressure.
The k8s server version is v1.13.2, and the pod priority is enabled.

```yaml
Name:               node-prober-worker-7c8f45f1-zczzz-caas-m22qk-test
Namespace:          kube-system
Priority:           2000001000
PriorityClassName:  system-node-critical
...
Annotations:        kubernetes.io/config.source: file
...
Status:             Failed
Reason:             Evicted
Message:            The node was low on resource: memory. Container bph was using 11896Ki, which exceeds its request of 0. 
...
```

As far as I can see, the eviction manager does not evict such pods.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/6cea9266dcfb89d1d278d102885c03b11dbe26fc/pkg/kubelet/eviction/eviction_manager.go#L547

**What you expected to happen**:

Static pods with `SystemCriticalPriority` are not deleted as well as those with a critical pod annotation.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

1. Boot pod with system-node-critical priority using by kubelet `--pod-manifest-path` option
2. Apply memory load to the target node until eviction manager observes memory pressure.
3. The critical and static pod is evicted.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

When I set critical-pod annotation (and enables `ExperimentalCriticalPodAnnotation`) insted of pod priority, the eviction manager **DOES NOT** evict the static and critical pod.

```
Jan 31 05:23:29 worker-7c8f45f1-zczzz-test-m22qk-test kubelet-wrapper[10083]: I0131 05:23:29.942701   10083 eviction_manager.go:358] eviction manager: pods ranked for eviction: node-prober-worker-7c8f45f1-zczzz-test-m22qk-test_kube-system(70eede23a9faee60311f7ee4a0d6457e), stress1-67f94bb9cf-m4qkx_kube-system(480601e2-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), stress1-67f94bb9cf-72qxp_kube-system(0b77dd77-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), stress1-67f94bb9cf-qtnt4_kube-system(0b7cc794-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), stress1-67f94bb9cf-6fg72_kube-system(0b7ae76f-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), stress1-67f94bb9cf-f7r8j_kube-system(0b7cd495-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), stress1-67f94bb9cf-t5n9g_kube-system(49738ffc-2518-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), pod-network-problem-detector-tw9f6_kube-system(f0ba6ab2-2517-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), node-exporter-z49dm_kube-system(f0ba7978-2517-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57), container-log-forwarder-s6z7s_kube-system(f6b56829-2517-11e9-9b99-fa163efcff57)
Jan 31 05:23:29 worker-7c8f45f1-zczzz-test-m22qk-test kubelet-wrapper[10083]: E0131 05:23:29.942727   10083 eviction_manager.go:548] eviction manager: cannot evict a critical static pod node-prober-worker-7c8f45f1-zczzz-test-m22qk-test_kube-system(70eede23a9faee60311f7ee4a0d6457e)
```

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): v1.13.2
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: baremetal

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: Static and critical pod is evicted
